formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the project that the service belongs to. In case of an application-level service it also owns the application.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the environment that the cluster belongs to.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the project that the environment belongs to. If not specified, the environment is assumed to be in the same project as the service.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the cluster in the environment on which the service was previously deployed. If not specified, the application tier mapping will be used to find the cluster name.

formElement.label: Network Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the network to delete.
